com.codename1.cordova

Class CordovaApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.ui.Component
      • com.codename1.ui.Container
        • com.codename1.ui.Form
          • com.codename1.cordova.CordovaApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codename1.ui.animations.Animation, com.codename1.ui.events.StyleListener, java.lang.Iterable<com.codename1.ui.Component>

    public class CordovaApplication
extends com.codename1.ui.Form
    Encapsulates a Cordova application.

    This class extends Form to display a BrowserComponent full-screen with a cordova app running inside it.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CordovaApplication

        public CordovaApplication()
        Constructor. Creates a new form with the a web view.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String url)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Loads the given URL. Generally you'll just want to use load("index.html") to load the index.html file from the src/html directory.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to load
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error like the file doesn't exist or can't be reached.

      • addPlugin

        public void addPlugin(java.lang.String service,
                      CordovaPlugin plugin)
        Registers a plugin for this app. Note: This is only required if the plugin has a native component, as this registers the native callbacks for the plugin.
        Parameters:
        service - The name of the plugin. Should match the name used by the plugin in the javascript layer for communicating with it's native counterpart.
        plugin - The plugin to be registered.

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Fires the "pause" event to the cordova js layer.

      • resume

        public void resume()
        Fires the "resume" event to the cordova js layer.

      • addGlobalPlugin

        public static void addGlobalPlugin(java.lang.String service,
                                   CordovaPlugin plugin)
        Registers a global plugin to be included in all CordovaApplication objects. This won't affect existing objects. Only ones instantiated after this call.
        Parameters:
        service - The name of the service that the plugin is registered to serve.
        plugin - The plugin.

      • onLoad

        protected void onLoad()
        Event fired after the application is loaded. Meant to be overridden by subclasses.

      • getWebview

        public com.codename1.ui.BrowserComponent getWebview()
        Returns reference to the WebView.
        Returns:
        The browser component where the cordova app is displayed.

      • getContext

        public com.codename1.javascript.JavascriptContext getContext()
        Returns reference to the Javascript context for the Cordova application.
        Returns:
        The javascript context.
